opennlp.tools.cmdline.doccat

Class DoccatFineGrainedReportListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • opennlp.tools.cmdline.doccat.DoccatFineGrainedReportListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DoccatEvaluationMonitor, EvaluationMonitor<DocumentSample>

    public class DoccatFineGrainedReportListener
extends Object
implements DoccatEvaluationMonitor
    Generates a detailed report for the POS Tagger.

    It is possible to use it from an API and access the statistics using the provided getters

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DoccatFineGrainedReportListener()
      Creates a listener that will print to System.err
      DoccatFineGrainedReportListener(OutputStream outputStream)
      Creates a listener that prints to a given OutputStream
